title: Verify: Refactor Backend Models for Pydantic v2
description:
Run automated tests for task T-042.
Review changes and verify acceptance criteria.
Original: Refactor all Pydantic models and usages to be compatible with Pydantic v2. Remove model_to_dict and related v1 compatibility code.
Criteria:
- All Pydantic models use v2 syntax
- No model_to_dict or v1 compat code remains
- All serialization/deserialization works as expected
acceptance_criteria: All Pydantic models use v2 syntax
No model_to_dict or v1 compat code remains
